def draw_zipfian_curve(word_count):
    plt.plot(sorted(word_count, reverse = True), marker = "o")
    plt.xscale("log")
    plt.yscale("log")
    plt.xlabel("log(Rank)")
    plt.ylabel("log(Frequency)")
    plt.show()
